metadata.title: CVE-2021-47287 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:driver core: auxiliary bus: Fix memory leak when driver_register() failIf driver_register() returns with error we need to free the memoryallocated for auxdrv->driver.name before returning from__auxiliary_driver_register()

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
